text: John Butkiewicz (born 9 November 1951) is an Australian field lacrosse player who was named the best midfielder at both the 1978 and 1982 World Lacrosse Championships (WLC). Butkiewicz represented Australia at a record five WLC's, from 1974 to 1990, and is in the Sport Australia Hall of Fame. Butkiewicz popularized the lacrosse face-off "clamp" that is widely used today. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Australian lacrosse players Category:Sport Australia Hall of Fame inductees Category:Sportspeople from Victoria (Australia)
title: John Butkiewicz
